column2: (let ((orig (current-buffer)) (buf (get-buffer-create " *vm-load-cache-policy-src*"))) (unwind-protect (progn (set-buffer buf) (erase-buffer) (insert "(setq vm-load-cache-policy-probe 'source)") (insert (char-to-string 10)) (write-region nil nil vm-load-cache-policy-source nil nil)) (set-buffer orig) (kill-buffer buf)))
